header.title: The best fence installation company in Pleasanton
bullets: Need a new fence in Pleasanton? Ergeon is the #1 choice!
Bringing kindness and transparency to the construction industry.
Free online custom quotes let you see an itemized breakdown for your project.
Our customers love the amazing craftsmanship delivered by our installers!

Yelp.description: Their fence price was competitive and they were very responsive. They kept me well informed from start to finish. Their crew did a great job and cleaned-up upon the completion of the job. They build a side gate and the hardware was heavy duty and good quality. Nice results.
Yelp.name: Rich D.
Yelp.title: Their crew did a great job and cleaned up upon the completion of the job.

Google.description: I contacted Ergeon and received a call their quote specialist. He set up an appointment with me on video to look at the fence and take measurements. It was a very pleasant experience. He could see everything as though he was there in person. He sent me a very reasonable quote. He put me in touch with the Project Manager who sent out the installers to come out to confirm the measurements. Once they got clearance from PGE they came out and installed my 60 feet fence in about 4 hours. I love my beautiful fence. I am very pleased.
Google.name: Juan J.
Google.title: I love my beautiful fence. I am very pleased.

faq.setback: 23 feet for the front yard,10 feet for street side yard . **except that such fence may come to within 5 feet from the side property line between the rear property line and a point set back 15 feet from the front corner of the residence closest to the side street, provided that the structure does not pose a traffic sight obstruction
faq.corner-lot-rules: 30 inches (2.5 feet) max on the triangular area formed by the street property lines and a line connecting points on the property lines 25 feet from the street intersection.

articles.description: If you’re looking to get a new fence in California, it’s important to know about the laws surrounding fences and home improvement projects. Our post will go over some important things to keep in mind.

When it’s time to get a new fence it’s important to always use a reputable, licensed, and insured contractor. Some people try to cut costs by using unlicensed contractors, but this can end up being a major issue if any problems happen during the installation or down the line. In this post, we’ll go over the main reasons why you should always use a licensed and insured fence contractor.

There’s a lot to consider when weighing the pros and cons of a wood fence versus a chain link fence. We’ve tried to make the process easier for you by diving deeper into some of the areas of consideration.
